title: MD
biography: On August 9, 2014, 18-year-old Michael Brown was shot and killed by police officer Darren Wilson in Ferguson, Missouri, a suburb of St. Louis.
aiSummary: Michael Brown is a endocrinology specialist with an H-index of 176 at UT Southwestern (Member). Has been published in Science, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
